Quiz1_questions.question: What does CSS stand for
Quiz1_questions.explanation: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheet

Quiz1_questions.question: Which tag create a paragraph?
Quiz1_questions.explanation: tag is used for a paragraph.

Quiz1_questions.question: What is the <id> tag?

choices.choiceb: Allows users to look up on Database
choices.choicec: Denotes the Unique ID of an element of the page
choices.choiced: Creates an input field for user to enter their unique ID

Quiz1_questions.explanation: The <id> tag creates a unique ID for an element in the page.

Quiz1_questions.question: What tag is used for a header 1?
Quiz1_questions.explanation: <h1> is used for Header 1.

Quiz1_questions.question: What tag is used for a header 2?
Quiz1_questions.explanation: <h2> is used for Header 2.

Quiz1_questions.question: What tag is used for a line break?
Quiz1_questions.explanation: is used for line break.

Quiz1_questions.question: What tag is used to add CSS?
Quiz1_questions.explanation: <style> is used for CSS.

Quiz1_questions.question: What tag is used to add JavaScript within HTML?
Quiz1_questions.explanation: <script> is used to add Javascript.

Quiz1_questions.question: What tag is used to make a text bold?
Quiz1_questions.explanation: <b> is used to bold a text.

Quiz1_questions.question: What is the image tag?
Quiz1_questions.explanation: is used for adding an image.

Quiz1_questions.question: What is Bootstrap

choices.choicea: Straps on a Boot to help tighten it.
choices.choiceb: Free and open-source CSS framework contains design templates.
choices.choiced: Creates an input field for user to enter their unique ID

Quiz1_questions.explanation: Bootstrap is used for design templates.

Quiz1_questions.question: What does HTML stand for?
Quiz1_questions.explanation: HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language.

Quiz1_questions.question: The HTML element for the largest heading is <h6>.
Quiz1_questions.explanation: The tag for the largest heading is <h1>

Quiz1_questions.question: The HTML for adding a background is <background> yellow </background>
Quiz1_questions.explanation: The correct syntax to adding a background color is <body style='background-color:yellow;>

Quiz1_questions.question: The HTML for italicizing a text is <i>
Quiz1_questions.explanation: Use <i> to italicize a text.

Quiz1_questions.question: The HTML for adding a background is <background> yellow </background>
Quiz1_questions.explanation: The correct syntax to adding a background color is <body style='background-color:yellow;>

Quiz1_questions.question: The character used to indicate an end tag is /
Quiz1_questions.explanation: Use / in a tag to end it.

Quiz1_questions.question: Inline elements are normally displayed without starting a new line.
Quiz1_questions.explanation: Inline elements are normally displayed without starting aew line.

Quiz1_questions.question: What tag is used for a numbered list?
Quiz1_questions.explanation: <ol> is used for a numbered list.

Quiz1_questions.question: What tag is used for a bulleted list?
Quiz1_questions.explanation: <ul> is used for a bulleted list.
